text: A crow half dead the thirst
Came upon a pitcher which had once been full of water
But when the crow put its beak into the mouth of the pitcher
He found that only very little water was left in it..

And that he could not reach far enough down
to get at it..
Tried and he tried but at last had to give up in despair
Then a thought came to him and he took a pebble and dropped it into the pitcher
Then he took another pebble and dropped it into the pitcher

Then he took another pebble
and dropped that into the pitcher
Then he took another pebble and drop that Then into the pitcher
Then he took another pebble and dropped that into the pitcher
Then he took another pebble and dropped that into the pitcher
At last at last he saw the water mount up near him
And after casting him a few more pebbles
He was able to quench his thirst and save this life
Little by little does the trick
